entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then snow. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming north 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. High minus 3.
